In a distant kingdom, two brothers, Sunny and Moony, dream of joining the esteemed Royal Guard. When their village mayor assigns them a simple task, they embark on what seems like a routine mission. However, this small errand unfolds into an epic journey filled with ancient secrets, formidable foes, and divine challenges. As darkness threatens the realm, Sunny and Moony must rise to the occasion and uncover their true destiny.
